Text:
function ERI_EP05_03()
    --.起-2【1月第2週】「姫神家の真実」
    SaveData.Title = "姫神家の真実"

    --//CG：姉にすがるミナト（虚ろな目）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV024ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",2000,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0754.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hey, Marika-neesan, do you remember? That time when my randoseru got hidden at school." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0755.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "You and your two friends searched for my randoseru together and found it inside the incinerator, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0756.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "The two of you worked so hard to get rid of the trash smell and dirt... I was really happy back then..." ]])

    MSG([[ How many days had passed since then? ]])

    MSG([[ I enjoyed my daily conversations with Marika-neesan every day. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0757.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "There was also a time when you and your friends asked me to dress like a girl, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0758.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I was embarrassed at that time, but maybe it’s thanks to those experiences that I was able to smoothly learn makeup and styling." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0759.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "If only I had remembered earlier... school life would have definitely been easier." ]])

    MSG([[ It's strange how, when I'm in front of Marika-neesan, things I had almost forgotten start coming back to me one after another. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter how much we talked, the topics never ran out, and the gloomy feelings gradually lifted. I was back to normal now. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0760.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "By the way... what was the name of the friend of Marika-neesan who was so good at makeup?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0761.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "She taught me so many things and protected me when you weren’t around... I loved her just as much as you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0762.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Huh? It’s strange that I loved her but can’t remember her face or name... I really am such a klutz..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0763.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "With me like this, it’s no wonder I can’t protect Marika-neesan." ]])

    MSG([[ Now then, I wonder what kind of story we’ll have today. ]])

    MSG([[ There are so many things I want to talk about. I have plenty of time and energy. Today, I’m going to keep talking with Marika-neesan all day long. We’ll blossom with memories of our times together. Ah, it’s so fun. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m incredibly happy right now. Truly happy. So happy it’s almost troubling. I wish this time would last forever. Marika-neesan feels the same way, right? Yeah, that’s right. ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t even need to say it; we understand each other heart to heart. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0764.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Haha... hahahahaha." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0264.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "It’s about time you wake up, Minato Ikusa!" ]])

    --//CI：ダリアBU（真剣）目元切り抜き 010
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,-50)
    SET_CUTIN_01_S(200, 300,true)
    PLAY_SE("SEc056.wav")
    DARIA_PARTICLE_01(230,0,230,150,50)
    RESET_CUTIN_00()
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",100,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",800,false)

    --//SE：椅子から転げ落ちる音（ｽﾞｯﾀｰﾝｺﾞﾛｺﾞﾛ）
PLAY_SE("SEc007.wav")
WAIT(600)

    MSG([[ At that moment, I saw her beautiful, familiar eyes and felt dizzy as I tumbled off the chair. ]])

    --//BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    --//BU：ダリア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0265.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Minato-kun, can you hear my voice? This time, listen to what I have to say." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0765.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "D-Daria-san...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Daria-san reached out her hand to the fallen me and spoke. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0266.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Ah, good. It seems my words have finally reached you." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0267.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I apologize for the harsh treatment. Since you were brought to this hospital room, you’ve gradually lost even the ability to speak..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0268.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I had no choice but to use the “<r=アーサーズ・>Battle Princess</r><r=キス>Gaze</r>”." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0269.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Minato-kun, won’t you listen to me today?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0766.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I don’t want to hear anything." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I didn’t take Daria-san’s hand and stood up alone. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter what I hear now, it won’t change anything. After all, there’s nothing I can do to save Marika-neesan. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0767.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "All I want is to be able to talk with Marika-neesan. Please leave me alone." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0270.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I understand your sadness. I’m also terrified to face reality. In fact, I was once someone who ran away from Marika." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0271.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "But you’re different, right? You’ve faced every harsh situation so far. Even with trembling legs, you moved forward." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0272.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I selfishly want you to be strong. Unlike me, I want to believe you can confront reality, Minato-kun." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0768.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "It’s impossible to confront it. All I can do now is apologize." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0769.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Or better yet, should I go to Yuriai Private Academy right now and kneel down, apologizing for deceiving everyone all this time?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0770.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "If so, I’m more than willing. Let’s go immediately." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0771.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Because I have done something that bad." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0273.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "No. No one asks for an apology." ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san grabbed my shoulder and spoke with shaking shoulders. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0274.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Get a grip. As Erika Ikusa, you brought much benefit to Yuriai Private Academy, no harm." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0275.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Unlike me and Nemesia, those who know you must understand how deeply you truly loved Yuriai Private Academy from your heart." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0276.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "In fact, Yuriai Private Academy, having lost someone as central as you, is now about to fall into Nemesia’s hands. At this rate, that school is finished." ]])

    MSG([[ ――Yuriai Private Academy falling into Nemesia Himegami’s hands? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0772.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "What does that mean?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0277.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Think about it. You defeated Lira-kun, Uran-kun, and even me in the Princess Election. It’s fair to say the academy’s popularity was divided between Hermes and Erika-kun." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0278.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "What happens if your position is lost in such a situation? Obviously, all support will naturally concentrate on the last remaining princess, Hermes. Just as Nemesia planned." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0279.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "After that, all they need to do is have Hermes speak their words, and the academy will be manipulated exactly as Nemesia wishes." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0773.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Is that... what it means?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I understood Nemesia-san’s motive when she exposed my cross-dressing at that timing. There was one more thing I realized. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0774.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...So Daria-san deliberately held back in the final Princess Election against me?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0775.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "By gathering support for me, then revealing my true identity, to concentrate popularity solely on Hermes-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0280.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "...That’s right. I found the contest with you interesting and got serious, but in the end, I held back as Nemesia ordered." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0281.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Losing this Princess Election was the final condition for severing ties with the Himegami family." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0282.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "As a 'princess' standing on the stage of the Princess Election and as a martial artist, I believe no apology to you is enough. I am truly sorry." ]])

    MSG([[ Learning the truth behind that confusing match gave me some relief. ]])

    MSG([[ At the same time, anger welled up inside me toward Nemesia-san for ruining the match. ]])

    MSG([[ But that anger soon faded. After all, nothing has changed—I still can’t do anything. ]])

    MSG([[ Because I have already lost to Nemesia-san. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0776.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "It should be fine to leave it to Hermes-san. I know well how much she loves Yuriai Private Academy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0777.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "No matter what Nemesia says, she shouldn’t lead Yuriai Private Academy in a bad direction." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0283.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Yes... if it’s only Hermes. She harbors no malice. As her sister who loves her, I guarantee that she is an innocent child." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0284.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "But because she’s pure, she blindly obeys Nemesia’s words. For Hermes, Nemesia’s words are absolute. She was raised never to doubt them." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0285.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Because of that purity, Hermes shows no pretenses. No malice can be sensed. She’s an unknowing puppet sacrificed to the Himegami family’s designs." ]])

--;吉　テキスト修正「実現するためだけに」→「実現するために」（2020/02/02 01:03）
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0286.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Hermes was created to realize the 'supreme' beauty Nemesia Himegami venerates." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0778.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "C-Created to realize the ‘supreme’ beauty...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0779.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "N-No way. There’s no way she would train her own child like that." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0287.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "She does. Nemesia’s obsession with ‘beautiful girls’ is that extreme." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0288.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "In fact, simply because it didn’t suit her own aesthetic sense, she forced the coeducation of Yuriai Private Academy." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0289.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "She enrolled Hermes, an advocate of her own will, and thoroughly pressured Marika, who was the leader of the conservatives." ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san approached the sleeping Marika-neesan and gently touched her side hair. ]])

    MSG([[ Her profile looked so affectionate, filled with deep love. ]])

--;吉　テキスト修正「愛していた」→「愛してた」（2020/02/02 01:07）
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0290.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I doubt you’ll believe it now, but I truly loved Marika. She was the only one I could truly trust, and I believe she trusted me, too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0291.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I often listened to Marika’s weak words when she was troubled as a conservative, right there in her bed. Ah, I think we once even stormed the board of directors together?" ]])
    -- //添い寝です。マリカとルームメイトだったダリアさんは落ち込むとよく添い寝をしてあげてましたが、マリカのことが好きすぎて手を出せませんでした。

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Marika’s speech was effective—we somehow managed to reduce the number of boys in the division to fewer than five. It was very thrilling." ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san chuckled softly. But a single tear flowed from her eye. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "That’s why Nemesia used me to eliminate Marika. She threatened me and forced me to stay away from Marika." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0294.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I... couldn’t defy Nemesia. Trusting Marika wouldn’t succumb to malice, I kept silent and kept my distance." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0295.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "The result is as you know. I abandoned my closest friend. What I told you before—that I’m the one who pushed Marika to the edge—is true." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0296.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "However... it seems my betrayal alone wasn’t the whole reason. Maybe it was my arrogance to think Marika trusted me." ]])

    MSG([[ Speaking with self-mockery, Daria-san headed for the door. She put her hand on the door, looked back at me, and spoke. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0297.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "If there’s a cause for the wounds in Marika’s heart other than me, it’s that I couldn’t stop Nemesia’s malice." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0298.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "If I could have stopped Nemesia, maybe..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ There she hesitated and then left the hospital room. ]])
    --//SE：引き戸の開閉音（すーっ）
PLAY_SE("SEb004.wav")
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[ Left alone, I looked up at the ceiling and absentmindedly thought. ]])

    MSG([[ If I could stop Nemesia-san, maybe Marika-neesan would wake up...? ]])

    MSG([[ What could I possibly do against someone even Marika-neesan couldn’t overcome and whom even Daria-san had to obey? ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t do anything. I shouldn’t be able to. After all, I’ve already lost everything. ]])
    --//CG：姉にすがるミナト（虚ろな目）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV024ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0780.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "That’s right... Marika-neesan." ]])

    MSG([[ And with that, I resumed my conversation with Neesan— ]])
    --　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP05_04")
end
